job_description:
• Rapid Growth & Career Trajectory: Expect to move into a technical leadership position within months, not years.
• Proven experience with LLM agents or similar orchestration tools (LangGraph, LangChain, etc.
• )Hands-on expertise in computer vision (pose estimation, regression, object detection) and model deploymentStrong full-stack development skills in production environmentsExceptional problem-solving skills, rapid execution, and ability to thrive in a fast-moving startupExcellent communication and collaboration skills—you’ll be working across multiple domainsComfortable working onsite in Irvine, CA Build and deploy LLM-powered coaching assistants that scale personalized golf instruction for thousands of lessons.
• Accelerated Impact: Your contributions will shape the future of AI coaching and the direction of the company from day one.
• Equity & Ownership: Meaningful equity ensures you share in the company’s success.
• Cutting-Edge Technology: Work at the intersection of AI, computer vision, synthetic media, and sports tech.
• Elite Team & Culture: Join a small, high-energy, high-velocity team of ambitious engineers, scientists, and creators.
• Retrain and optimize computer vision models for real-time on-device pose estimation, swing analysis, and object detection.
